tweet: 😬Oh c'mon!  Someone hacked official site of #Monero #cryptocurrency project and quietly replaced legitimate #Linux + Windows binaries available for download with malicious versions designed to steal funds 💰 from the users' wallets.  Read more:  https://t.co/S7zJnNxTXf  #infosec  https://t.co/NEl2tMzQTS
An anonymous hacker under the pseudonym Phineas Fisher has offered a bounty of $100,000 in BTC, or Monero, for hacking Halliburton and NSO Group.  https://t.co/dRuZY8Zfcl

@Swati_THN The supply-chain #cyberattack potentially affects Monero users who downloaded the CLI wallet between Monday 18th 2:30 am UTC and 4:30 pm UTC.  It was spotted when a user found that cryptographic hash for binaries he downloaded from the site didn't match the hashes listed on it.
My sympathies to the Monero team. This kind of thing is a legit nightmare.  https://t.co/YuQuPVNASc
PSA: We've posted an announcement regarding the potentially compromised CLI v0.15.0.0 binaries on our website.   https://t.co/rLnN8HrJ1d
Did you know Dandelion++ will be implemented in Monero in the foreseeable future?!

😬Oh c'mon!  Someone hacked official site of #Monero #cryptocurrency project and quietly replaced legitimate #Linux + Windows binaries available for download with malicious versions designed to steal funds 💰 from the users' wallets.  Read more:  https://t.co/NnpowvkdDB  #infosec
The official website of the Monero cryptocurrency has been compromised to deliver a malware-infected file that steals funds from account owners:  https://t.co/mHs2cCGE5h
The Monero team has published an official announcement on their site and widened the compromise window from 35mins to 14h  "between Monday 18th 2:30 AM UTC and 4:30 PM UTC"   https://t.co/K8Tmg3fpoW
Daily Crypto News - Monero Site Hacked | Fidelity Gets Licensed | SLP Postage | LocalCryptos | More!  https://t.co/DdPH6jN6i6

Monero's official website has been hacked & the software available for download on #Monero’s website was compromised to steal #XMR cryptocurrency.  Monero - Keep your privacy, lose your coins?  Care to comment Riccardo Spagni (@fluffypony)?  https://t.co/XmBHVO7hJn

Sickened by the Monero team's comments today.  "We expected that the box might get popped at some point."  "Your little website is not under the same threat from resourceful, sophisticated attackers."  Spreading word about a server breach does not put me on a "high horse" (cont)  https://t.co/lcXAsdfdbk
